Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.text.hyperlink.IHyperlinkPresenter

  • Packages that use IHyperlinkPresenter 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.jface.text
    Provides a framework for creating and manipulating text documents.
    org.eclipse.jface.text.hyperlink
    Provides support for detecting and displaying hyperlinks in ISourceViewers.
    org.eclipse.jface.text.source
    Provides a framework for connecting document regions with annotations and for displaying those.
    org.eclipse.ui.editors.text
    Provides a standard text editor and concrete document providers based IFileBuffer and others directly handling IFile and IStorage as editor input.

    • Uses of IHyperlinkPresenter in org.eclipse.jface.text.hyperlink

      Classes in org.eclipse.jface.text.hyperlink that implement IHyperlinkPresenter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultHyperlinkPresenter
      The default hyperlink presenter underlines the link and colors the line and the text with the given color.
      class  MultipleHyperlinkPresenter
      A hyperlink presenter capable of showing multiple hyperlinks in a hover.
